content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: smoker
inventory=[{"type": "dead_bubble_coral", "quantity": 6, "index": 13}, {"type": "pink_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "light_gray_banner", "quantity": 16, "index": 21}, {"type": "light_gray_terracotta", "quantity": 41, "index": 22}, {"type": "stripped_dark_oak_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 30}, {"type": "stripped_jungle_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "furnace", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "jungle_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}, {"type": "warped_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 41}]

thought: To craft a smoker, I need to place a furnace in the middle of the crafting grid, with wood on either side. I have a stripped jungle log at slot 32, so I will move it to the leftmost slot of the crafting grid (slot 2).
Ok
act: move from slot 32 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: smoker
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "stripped_jungle_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "dead_bubble_coral", "quantity": 6, "index": 13}, {"type": "pink_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "light_gray_banner", "quantity": 16, "index": 21}, {"type": "light_gray_terracotta", "quantity": 41, "index": 22}, {"type": "stripped_dark_oak_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 30}, {"type": "furnace", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "jungle_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}, {"type": "warped_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 41}]
thought: Next, I need to place a furnace in the middle of the crafting grid. I have a furnace at slot 41, so I will move it to the middle slot of the crafting grid (slot 4).
Ok
act: move from slot 41 to slot 4 with quantity 1

thought: Finally, I need to place another piece of wood on the right side of the crafting grid. I have a furnace at slot 36, so I will move it to the rightmost slot of the crafting grid (slot 5).
Ok
act: move from slot 36 to slot 5 with quantity 1

inventory=[{"type": "smoker", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "stripped_jungle_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "warped_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "furnace", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "jungle_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 6}, {"type": "stripped_dark_oak_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 8}, {"type": "dead_bubble_coral", "quantity": 6, "index": 13}, {"type": "pink_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "light_gray_banner", "quantity": 16, "index": 21}, {"type": "light_gray_terracotta", "quantity": 41, "index": 22}]
thought: Now I can craft the smoker by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1
